item.title: 험난한 암호화폐 세상을 여행하려는 Python 유저를 위한 안내서
item.description:
Description

In this session, I will briefly discuss the following topics: How the cryptocurrency ecosystem operates, Cryptocurrency airdrops and various incidents related to them, On-chain data analysis based on real-world data using Python, Other ways to contribute to the cryptocurrency ecosystem with Python
item.dc:creator: 이왕원
